item.title: WE ARE A STRATEGIC INTELLIGENCE AND ADVISORY FIRM
item.description:
WE ARE A STRATEGIC INTELLIGENCE                          AND ADVISORY FIRM

KC works for a small number of the world’s leading companies. We help them understand issues that are hard to quantify but have a significant impact. For example, we assess the effectiveness of companies’ risk management, their exposure to changing government policy or regulation, and their vulnerability to discontinuities such as new competitors and technological change. We also shed light on geopolitical and security issues.

item.title: GLOBAL ETHICS AND COMPLIANCE
item.description:
GLOBAL ETHICS AND COMPLIANCE

KC Holding Company (Kell-Cumming) applies the highest ethical standards across its operations. This guiding principle includes an uncompromising stance on bribery. We commit to applying consistently the letter and spirit of applicable anti-bribery legislation in all markets and jurisdictions in which KC operates.

item.title: INTELLIGENCE IN THE BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT
item.description:
INTELLIGENCE IN THE BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT

Intelligence, as a corporate-level function, allows the timely and effective application of resources that provide a benefit to our client’s customers, that our client’s competitors can’t match.

item.title: PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS
item.description:
PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS

We deliver intelligence and analysis to help underpin senior level decision-making and problem solving. Our aim is to be the firm of choice when the outcome really matters.
